parse: Conjunction
str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Conjunction
str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.

parse: Verb - Aorist Infinitive Middle
str2: To boast; I glory (exult) proudly. From some base akin to that of aucheo and euchomai; to vaunt.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Adjective - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Senseless, foolish, inconsiderate. Properly, mindless, i.e. Stupid, ignorant, egotistic, rash, or unbelieving.

parse: Conjunction
str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: Probably a fuller form of rheo; an alternate for epo in certain tenses; to utter, i.e. Speak or say.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: From alethes; truth.

parse: Conjunction
str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To spare, abstain, forbear. Of uncertain affinity; to be chary of, i.e. to abstain or to treat leniently.

parse: Adverb
str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Preposition
str2: Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Conjunction
str2: Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Preposition
str2: From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
